models.brainStatus: The current operational state of Strategy Brain, including its autonomy mode, active decision count, and overall health indicator.
models.decisions: Strategic choices made by Strategy Brain. Each decision flows through stages (Signal Detected → Analyzing → Proposed → Executing) and includes AI reasoning, source metrics, and expected outcomes.
models.channels: The Core Four marketing channels (Warm Outreach, Cold Outreach, Content, Paid Ads) that Strategy Brain monitors and optimizes. Each tracks budget allocation, performance metrics, and constraint detection status.
models.insights: Learned patterns from institutional memory that inform future decisions. These compound over time and represent winning strategies, failed experiments, and effective responses.
models.decisionMetrics: Source data that triggered each decision, including LTGP:CAC ratios, customer feedback signals, constraint indicators, and performance trends.

relationships: Brain Status reflects the current operational mode and tracks all active Decisions
Each Decision references source Channels and Decision Metrics that triggered it
Decisions create and reference Insights as they learn from past outcomes
Channels aggregate performance data that feeds into Decision creation
Decision Metrics provide the evidence and reasoning for each strategic choice

decisions.title: Shift $3,500/day from Cold Outreach to Paid Ads
decisions.description: LinkedIn ads showing 7.2:1 LTGP:CAC while cold email declining to 2.8:1. Recommend reallocating budget to capitalize on high-performing channel.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Increase overall LTGP:CAC from 4.5:1 to 5.3:1 within 7 days
decisions.aiThinking: Analyzed 14-day performance trend across all channels. Cold Outreach LTGP:CAC declined from 4.2:1 to 2.8:1 (33% drop) while Paid Ads improved from 5.1:1 to 7.2:1 (41% increase). Email open rates dropped from 38% to 22%, suggesting audience fatigue. LinkedIn CTR increased from 2.1% to 3.8%, indicating resonant messaging. Current budget allocation: Cold=$8k/day, Paid=$5k/day. Proposed: Cold=$4.5k/day, Paid=$8.5k/day. Risk assessment: Medium. Cold Outreach may recover with creative refresh, but current underperformance justifies reallocation. Historical pattern: Similar reallocations in Q3 2023 yielded 23% LTGP improvement over 30 days.

historicalContext.summary: Shifted $5k/day from Content to Paid Ads due to similar LTGP:CAC gap
historicalContext.outcome: Successful - overall LTGP improved 23% over 30 days

decisions.title: LinkedIn Audience Exhaustion Detected
decisions.description: Target audience of 250k reached 78% saturation. Frequency increased to 4.2 impressions/user. Applying More-Better-New framework to determine response.
decisions.expectedOutcome: TBD - analyzing whether to optimize creative (Better) or expand targeting (New)
decisions.aiThinking: Currently analyzing constraint type and appropriate response. Audience saturation: 78% of 250k target (195k reached). Frequency: 4.2 impressions/user (up from 2.1 last week). CTR declining: 3.8% → 3.2% over 5 days, suggesting ad fatigue. Creative tested: 3 variants, best performer at 3.8% CTR. CPA increased 18% week-over-week. Evaluating options: (1) BETTER: Launch 5 new creative variants with different hooks (estimated +0.8% CTR improvement), (2) NEW: Expand to adjacent audience segment (+180k users, slightly lower intent). Historical data: Creative refreshes in similar situations yielded 15-25% CTR improvement. Audience expansion to adjacent segments historically converted at 72% efficiency of core audience. Recommendation pending completion of variant performance prediction...

decisions.title: Pain Point Shift: 'Time to Results' Mentioned 3x More
decisions.description: Customer feedback analysis shows 'time to results' mentioned 47 times (up from 15 last month). May indicate offer positioning opportunity.

decisions.title: Increase Warm Outreach Budget by $2k/day
decisions.description: Referral program showing 8.9:1 LTGP:CAC with 31% monthly referral rate. Scaling to capitalize on compounding growth.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Target 35% monthly referral rate, maintain >8:1 LTGP:CAC
decisions.aiThinking: Warm Outreach via referral program dramatically outperforming all channels. Current metrics: 8.9:1 LTGP:CAC (highest across Core Four), 31% monthly referral rate (target: 25%+), 42% of new customers coming from referrals (up from 18% in Q4). Referral Growth Equation: 31% referred - 4% churned = 27% compounding monthly growth. Historical pattern: Referral programs show linear scaling up to 50% saturation, current at 31%. Investment: Increasing automated referral trigger budget from $3k/day to $5k/day. Risk: Low. Referral quality scores consistently 15% higher than cold acquisition. Customer LTV from referrals: $12,400 vs $8,100 cold acquisition.

historicalContext.outcome: Successful - referral rate increased from 18% to 28% over 60 days

decisions.title: Pause Content Channel for Creative Refresh
decisions.description: LinkedIn content engagement down 62% month-over-month. 6 hook formulas showing diminishing returns. Recommend 7-day pause for strategy evolution.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Develop 3 new content angles based on recent customer feedback, relaunch with fresh positioning
decisions.aiThinking: Content channel performance declining sharply. Engagement rate: 2.1% (down from 5.5% in December). Post reach: averaging 1,200 (down from 3,100). All 6 hook formulas tested, best performer (Big Promise) at 2.8% engagement. LTGP:CAC for content: 3.2:1 (below 5:1 target). Analysis suggests audience fatigue from repetitive positioning. Recent customer interviews revealed 3 emerging pain points not addressed in current content: (1) integration complexity, (2) time to first value, (3) team adoption challenges. Recommendation: 7-day creative pause to develop new content angles targeting these pain points. Historical precedent: Q2 2023 content refresh after similar decline resulted in 84% engagement recovery and 6.1:1 LTGP:CAC within 21 days of relaunch.

historicalContext.summary: Paused content for 10-day creative refresh during engagement decline
historicalContext.outcome: Successful - engagement recovered 84%, LTGP:CAC improved to 6.1:1 within 3 weeks

decisions.title: Launch 'Quick Start Workshop' Lead Magnet
decisions.description: Created new One Step lead magnet targeting 'time to results' pain point. 90-minute workshop format with immediate implementation framework.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Target 32% conversion rate on workshop landing page, 18% qualified lead rate
decisions.aiThinking: New offer engineered in response to 'time to results' pain point frequency increase. Lead magnet type: One Step (workshop) selected based on customer awareness level (Problem Aware → Solution Aware transition). Workshop delivers immediate value: 90-minute live session with implementation framework, workbook, and 3 quick-win templates. Value stack: Workshop ($997 value) + Implementation Workbook ($147) + Template Library ($247) + 30-day email course ($397) = $1,788 total value. Delivery: Live event (high perceived value) with replay access. No-show mitigation: automated reminder sequence. Similar workshop lead magnet in Q1 2023 converted at 28% with 22% qualified lead rate. Projected improvement based on stronger pain point alignment: 32% conversion, 18% qualified leads (slightly lower qualification due to top-of-funnel positioning).

historicalContext.summary: Launched similar workshop lead magnet for different pain point
historicalContext.outcome: Successful - 28% conversion, 22% qualified lead rate, contributed to 14% revenue increase

decisions.title: Apply 'More' Lever: Scale Cold Outreach Volume 3x
decisions.description: Cold Outreach capacity constraint identified. Currently sending 1,100 emails/day with 4.2:1 LTGP:CAC. Infrastructure supports 3,500/day. Recommend volume increase.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Increase daily email volume to 3,500 while maintaining 3.5:1+ LTGP:CAC
decisions.aiThinking: More-Better-New analysis indicates 'More' is appropriate lever. Current performance: 4.2:1 LTGP:CAC (above 3:1 threshold), 1,100 emails/day (31% of infrastructure capacity). Constraint identified: artificial volume cap, not audience or creative exhaustion. List size: 480k prospects (only 12% reached). Deliverability: 97% (healthy). Open rate: 28% (stable). Reply rate: 3.2% (above benchmark). Personalization engine can handle 3,500/day without quality degradation. Risk assessment: Conservative 3x scale unlikely to saturate audience or trigger deliverability issues. Similar 'More' lever applied to Paid Ads in Q4 2023: scaled spend 2.8x, LTGP:CAC declined only 9% (from 6.1:1 to 5.5:1), net revenue increase of 142%. Monitoring plan: Track deliverability and response rates daily during ramp, pause if LTGP:CAC falls below 3.5:1.

historicalContext.summary: Applied 'More' lever to Paid Ads, scaled 2.8x
historicalContext.outcome: Successful - LTGP:CAC declined 9% but net revenue increased 142%

decisions.title: Paid Ads Spend Approaching Daily Limit ($10k)
decisions.description: LinkedIn ads spend tracking toward $9,800/day. Will hit $10k escalation threshold by tomorrow if trend continues. May require human approval for increase.
